description.title: Description
description.description: A short description of the repository

homepage.title: Homepage
homepage.description: URL with more information about the repository

auto_init.title: Auto Init
auto_init.description: Pass true to create an initial commit with empty README.

private.title: Private
private.description: Either true to create a private repository, or false to create a public one. Creating private repositories requires a paid GitHub account.

has_issues.title: Issues
has_issues.description: Either true to enable issues for this repository, false to disable them.

has_wiki.title: Wiki
has_wiki.description: Either true to enable the wiki for this repository, false to disable it.

has_downloads.title: Downloads
has_downloads.description: Either true to enable downloads for this repository, false to disable them.

team_id.title: Team
team_id.description: The id of the team that will be granted access to this repository. This is only valid when creating a repository in an organization.

gitignore_template.title: Auto Init
gitignore_template.description: Desired language or platform .gitignore template to apply. Use the name of the template without the extension. For example, “Haskell”. Ignored if the auto_init parameter is not provided.
